answers.answer: I am 33 weeks and have gained 41lbs all together. My doctor hasn't said anything about my weight gain. I was 125lbs pre-pregnancy.

So far this pregnancy, I've gained nearly 50lbs.... My doctor was very concerned and always nagging me about my weight, I stared off around 180lbs.... She had it to where I should only gain 15-20lbs, but my body said otherwise lol.... She stopped nagging me about it once my test came back negative for gestational diabetes.... I'm not worried about the weight gain, I gained nearly 100lbs with my 1st baby and lost it all just about, she was only 7lbs 3oz.... This baby measuring average also....
Don't let the weight issue bother you....Oh And i barely eat with this pregnancy and still gained a significant Amount of weight....
Due to this weight gain she says I have hyper tension too :( tonite I wasn't hungry at all thinking all of these. Am hungry always n if I don't eat I get heartburn or become gassy

Don't deprive baby of food, just try healthy choices.... I love fruit and yogurt so that's what I would snack on, oh and baby carrots cause they're kind of sweet....Just cook healthy meals....Don't starve yourself....

question: Am 31 weeks currently and have gained over 15 KGS till now. My doc never cared until now and when I crossed over 15 she said gain a too much . is this normal or am I the only one :(
title: depressed over weight gain :(
